wide_range_of_topics_description: We offer extensive support to students across various subjects, including Secondary education , Elementary education , Minimum Employable Skill & Lok Vidhya according to NEP 2022. It also provides guidance on study techniques, career development, and balancing academic and personal life.
VR_Based_Video_Content_description: In addition to our extensive academic support, Sahayak offers VR-based video content that enhances learning through immersive, high-quality educational experiences. This technology provides interactive and engaging ways to grasp complex concepts, elevating the quality of education.
verified_certificate_description: We provide the option to obtain a verified certificate upon completion of a quiz. This certificate validates your knowledge and demonstrates your commitment to learning and self-improvement. This can be used in CVs, resumes to highlight your skills.
apprentenceship_&_job_offers_description: Our platform supports students with apprenticeship opportunities and job placements, connecting them with valuable internships and career offers to facilitate practical experience and employment in their chosen fields.
